duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide primary patient care for specifically assigned patients, including assessments, care planning, evaluation, and education of patients receiving infusion therapy and/or other nursing services in the home or alternate site setting.
Initiate and maintain all communications with appropriate care team members.
Evaluate and educate patients/care partners to safely administer home infusion therapy.
Evaluate the home environment where care is to be provided and identify required interventions.
Develop each patient's Care Map in conjunction with other clinical team members and evaluate the patient's response to therapy.
Appropriately discharge primary patients and complete discharge summary.
Develop and maintain caseload scheduling and communications.
Document patient visits to physician or lab drawing station on calendar.

education_certification.credential: Current nursing license for applicable state
